channel.title: Clickable words
channel.description: Ok, i have done this before but i have like suddenly forgotten but when you like log into the server and on the chatbox it says like: "server_bot: ***********.tk" but one of the times i programed it so you can click it can somone please tell me so then i can do it thanks, residence
